title: Frequently Asked Questions
link_one: How can I edit my profile?
link_two: How can I review my transaction history?
instruction_link_one_title: How can I edit my profile?
instruction_link_one_step_one: From any page, click your user name which appears at the top right corner of the site.
instruction_link_one_step_two: From the dropdown menu that displays, click My Profile.
instruction_link_two_title: How can I review my transaction history?
instruction_link_two_step_two: Click the Show Transactions tab to view your most recent transactions.
instruction_link_two_step_three: Click the Find Transactions tab to show transactions by a date range.
